column1: Are you missing your favorite performance from an Olympic Opening or Closing Ceremony? Just let us know in the comments and we will add them to a future #MusicMonday!
The artistic aspect and emotional interpretation of Medvedeva reminds us that the figure skating is not only a sport but a state of the art.
In an interview after the Olympics, Evgenia said that she felt like she had wings while skating this long program. I can feel that just by watching this video. That's how amazing she was
This program is bittersweet. She skates with her  soul as always.
I never watch this without crying. ‚ÄúI did everything I could.‚Äù

This is the only performance that has made me cry. And it wasn‚Äôt because I thought she had the best skating skills in the field or because she was the best jumper or the most consistent. It was because she just skates with her soul. Every time she steps on the ice she is fully committed and she feels every note.
Chills. Absolute chills. No one will skate like her again. With such poetry, skill, and emotion.
It's been 6 years since Pyeongchang ..... this performance never fails to captivate me

I will always remember the ending of this piece, as the sound of the train builds and Evgenia holds her hand dramatically over face as the whistle blows. It perfectly encapsulates the fate of Anna from Tolstoy's novel and is one moment from my many hours of watching figure skating I will never forget. One of my favorite performances.

You can judge her technique in the jumps, especially the lutz, but you can't deny she captivates you from the beginning to the end and she produces art on the ice, exactly what i found out to be missing in alina's program! What a great performance to watch! Well done Evgenia!

This used to be her greatest performance. Now we have Exogenesis, Memoirs Of A Geisha and even her exhibition program, idontwannabeyouanymore. Her entire program set was one of the best in this season among all others. You'd think she was at her peak already during the Olympic season but we were wrong. She was still growing, improving, despite all the odds stacked against her.

To all the people who said that it was her time to retire after getting a silver and changing coaches, no, she will keep on fighting and proving herself.

The fascinating thing about her performance is that she is so in tune with this performance that all the technical elements and the difficulty seem to disappear into this absolute masterpiece of her superb skating and the intricate choreography. Also she just effortlessly transitions from one to the next and it's always 100% spot on with the music. I can see why she later said that this was the most perfect flow moment, skating absolutely in the moment and all out with her heart she has ever had.
This is not just a skating program, this is ART.
Did anyone else cry at the end when she cried? Truly the most amazing skater of the current era. Her passion and artistry is beyond compare.
Looking at the comments i‚Äôm glad i‚Äôm not the only one crying‚Ä¶ she is the winner for me, she is a true artist.

Such an amazing performance. The choreography matches the music, but that's not all, she tells us this whole story through the choreography. Nowadays, most programs are about going from one side of the rink to the other only to get the jumps done and the choreography barely matches the music. This is truly art.
It is 2021 and I still can't hold my tears when I watch her olimpic program!
Listen, I hadn‚Äôt watched this for a while and it is now more obvious how much she‚Äôs improved from this. I‚Äôm so proud of her!
its like a whole movie the way she just told a story with her performance. wow
She embodied Anna Karenina so well. A part of me wishes the judges read the book and then judge her once again, as the PCS would have definitely been higher.
Zhenya still makes me cry 4 years later. The greatest artist on the ice...
One of the most iconic performances in Figure skating history. She‚Äôs just so amazing
Evgenia is something special in figure skating. She went deep into the souls of people and touched it. I still cant forget her tears. She deserves all the best in  her life and sport career!
Both Zhenya SP and FP are so beautiful. Silver is great, for sure, but I still cannot believe that she didn't leave with a gold medal for her performance

!LEGENDARY!
That was the day Evgenia stole my heart,and she still haven‚Äôt given it back,agains all odds!

i still don't see why she wasn't the winner. everything about her captured your attention. the fluidity. the technique. it's beautiful to watch. she's not just jumping. she's telling a story and it's sad that people don't see that
Evgenia is the reason why I discovered the figure skating world. She's so beautiful especially when she skates
the day after tomorrow will be five years. I'm still here and she is still the Olympic champion of my heart.

Thank you. This performance is extraordinary, captivating, sentimental. Evgenia Medvedeva at her best. Just look at the delicacy of her lines, the power of her interpretation, the intricacy of her skating skills. An explosion of drama and passion. Amazing.
I'm here in 2021 and her performance still moves me to tears...so captivating...so much passion!üëèüèºüíê
We need to give the judges glasses. There is no other way to describe the fact that they put her in second place. Evgenia legend of figure skating

It's heartbreaking to me that this performance didn't win the gold at the Olympics . This performance is pure art on ice. Too bad they value technicity more. Because of Zenya I started to watch figure skating
Sophistication, confidence, brilliant skater. This is Art.
QUEEN of the ice. She deserved olympic gold medal as former world junior champion and 3x world champion. She was born to do it and we have seen that.

The sport is moved fwd by legends, by superstars, the ones who become influencers to the crowd. There are very few such athletes in the fugure skating and Evgenia is one of them.
Most of skaters skate with their brains, Evgenia skates with her entire soul. The warmth, the splendor and her dedication to the skating are just mindblowing. Queenüíó
She's actually the reason why i fell in love with figure skating ‚ù§ üòä

I've never seen such beauty on the ice. She was mesmerizing in this performance. It had everything from technically ability to a genius artistry. I've been watching Figure Skating for 44 years and I never saw anyone like her!!!

No matter how someone skates now, jumps quads, he will never be able to convey this lightness and emotionality at the box office. Even if you are a hundred times a gymnast, you will never be able to skate as perfectly as Zhenya. It's great
I thought I could watch it without tears after almost two years, but it‚Äôs impossible. Magnificent Evgenia! I wish her all the best ! ‚ù§Ô∏è
this was the moment I became a figure skating fan. thank you, evgenia!

That end still tears me up. I remember crying in the livestream when she skated so well. 

I just love Evgenia so much.

I just watched Alina's performance, and while it was beautiful like her. I just can not understand how Evgenia did not win here. This was one of the most beautiful, if not the most beautiful performance in figure skating ever.

Absolutely amazing.  I have seen a lot of skating performances over the years, but this may be my favorite women's competitive performance of all time time.  She gave everything she had in this performance.  There was not a finger out of place.  Absolutely incredible!

I'll never forget this moment! Just iconic! I felt so much the first time I saw It and I still do It. Really, i have no words. Thank you so much Zhenya. You are art, this is ART‚ù§Ô∏èüåπI'm literally crying again
She's such an amazing performer I can feel that she pours her soul into every single one of her programs

Everything was for good. She had the silver, she had our souls, then she had stimulus to move forward, to improve, to be stronger, healthier, better.
Love her so much, what a spirit!
Today, after 3 years, I recognize that, as much as I appreciated Zagitova, the unforgettable program is Medvedeva's. Masterful.
This is the only program that made me connect with the skater through the performance. I don't care who won. This will stay legendary forever.
Evgenia...broke my heart because it was so beautiful :,((( Glad to see her finally back in Rostelecom cup!! Keep fighting Zhenya!
what makes all her performances great is that it isnt just plain skating and doing moves. its also facial expressions, smallest details, telling a story. she deserved the gold more than anyone.
True artist on ice. Thank you Evgenia for this unforgettable and legendary olympic performance!

So here I am again, watching & crying, like she did in the end. She knew that this was the best performance of her life & in some way she knew that she wouldn‚Äôt win, although she skated a 1st place performance. They changed the rules, but it was too late for her.... But she has our hearts & that‚Äôs more than Olympic gold..... ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
That performance was stunning and she‚Äôs even better now‚ù§Ô∏è I still think her best performance is yet to come üôè
I absolutely adore this girl. U can see in her face and body she truly loves to skate. I was in tears at the end. Love from üá∫üá∏üíï
She brings me to tears‚Ä¶ the emotion! Knowing she was skating with her foot crumbling‚Ä¶ be happy Zhenya, we love you! üñ§
That program was a true masterpiece. How sensitive and breathtaking!...
While Zhenya wasn't the most technical of skaters, she was incredibly emotive and knew how to express the music. I miss watching her skate.
I don't understand why someone would dislike thisüòûüíñ i think it's awesome, i'm so happy for her

I just finished watching Alina Zagitova‚Äôs FS and I cried because that girl worked so hard. The strength to endure all those jumps at the second half of the program. Now I‚Äôm watching Evgenia‚Äôs and she radiates artistry, her performances are always so beautiful, I cried again! Both such phenomenal skaters, very unique in their own ways, and winners in my eyes üòç
I can not breath. She is a miracle. The magical moment that Pyeong Chang gave us. She is a legend. I wish her many victories. üíóüíóüíóüíóüíóüíóüíóüíóüíóüíóüíóüíóüíóüíó

This performance was the only time I've been moved to tears by any artistic routine like this. Zagitova may have had the athletic prowess to stack all her jumps into the second half of the program to get the bonus, but Medvedeva is the only skate I still remember 4 years later. Shame she was beset by injury, and didn't get the support she needed to appear in Beijing. Speaking as a red blooded American, this routine remains one of my top 5 all time Olympic memories (and the only one I remember of a non-American)
When she jumps with one arm over her head it looks so badass!  Kinda like how Shcherbakova raises her arms into the air just before she enters her flips.
A year later and I'm thinking... "someone was more gold than this?" Evgenia deserves all the gold in the universe PLUS as much more gold as she wants.

She's literally the reason why I became interested in watching figure skating. The way she emotes through all her movements and every part of her body and the way she feels the music (coupled with her technique and advanced elements) made her truly stand out among all the other skaters. Anyone who watched her programs could easily tell not just that she was a talented skater, but also that she genuinely loved to skate. She never ceased to be a joy to watch. After hearing the recent news about her retirement, all I can say is that I wish her all the best with whatever she chooses to do with her life after skating, and that the sport will never be the same without her. You're an absolute gem, Zhenya. ü•∞
My gold medalist in my mind. I love how she performs !!

Finally!!!We had been waiting for this for a while....
She told us a story with this program...that tears at the end broke me into tears too.....
I am happy to see her keep improving and not stop skating!!She has a lot more to show...
she was injured, hungry, and dehydrated yet she managed to deliver this beautiful program. evgenia medvedeva. the true and forever ice queen.
She seriously should've won gold. In my eyes, she did. This was purely phenomenal.‚ù§Ô∏è
Thank you Olympic, it's raining tears all over the world once again. FS hasn't become a fairer place since then, but still thank you for uplowding this masterpiece in high quality.
That interpretation and choreography was truly authentic and original.  Honestly it might have been too deep for mainstream skating.  That was complete and total art.

This girl ... She makes me cry again.  My whole family loves figure skating and then, 1.5 years ago, we watched everything together.  I was rooting for her alone.  She felt tears roll down her cheeks and burst into tears.
 I am only 13, but I know that this program evokes the best feelings in me. Forever, Medo-chan...

She really deserved to win gold. Zagitova stacked all of her jumps at the end and got the point bonus, but Zhenya is a much more artistic skater who has beautiful flow between elements. Zagitova's performance felt more stilted than Zhenya's.
Este programa es una obra de arte, no se como explicarlo pero siento que me da escalofr√≠os... la delicadeza de sus movimientos y las emociones que transmite con ellos. Simplemente la mejor <3

i hope she never regrets her performance here. i wont presume to know as much as a judge but my heart tells me this wins 1st. every moment of it was art. the jumps felt as much as part of the dance of her story as did the footwork. many times i feel like jumps are just forced into the middle of a dance for the sake of it. she made them part of it. and they were beautiful jumps too, very streamlined. i hope she is enjoying her life now.

This is WOW. This is perfect. I love her for make it her way and going her way and never stop! She is one of the greatest Figure Skaters on Ice the world has ever seen. She is adorable and a role model.
I have watched this performance so many times, before you include on official Olympic chanel. So you can put on +400 views only from me lol

her skating is so beautiful. she not only is a beautiful skater, but her facial expressions are amazing. she's one of the best skaters i've seen, along with alina zagitova.

I intentionally watched the two free programmes one after another.  first Zagitova's then Medvedeva's.. both the coaches' and the girls' work is unbelievable. Think Alina got more technic at that moment but less speed and thought more how to make the elements.. Zhenya was completely living the character and she seemed to feel every note of the music so her speed and the way she moved on ice was amazing. The jumps lacked the confidence and height though...  that's how i think..  both girls are pure talents. Different in age and manners. But there could not be two first places. Truly  i waited Zhenya's come back in 2022. I realise figure scating to be one of the difficultiest sports.. girls are hard working and real fighters.

Medvedeva is LIGHT YEARS ahead of Zagitova as a performer. The difference in components should have been at least 6-7 points only in LP. What a shame by judges. Unfair valuation of true artists destroys figure skating as a perfect mix of sports and art and turns it into a circus with focus only on the quality of elements
